description: A state of emergency is declared after a ferocious storm engulfs Vladivostok and surrounding areas.
title: Vladivostok snowstorm: Emergency declared amid chaos and power cuts
title_page: Vladivostok snowstorm: Emergency declared amid chaos and power cuts - BBC News
maintext: Rescue services and the army are scrambling to deal with the fallout. At least 150,000 homes have been left without electricity.
